reference.Name: ALL
reference.Description: Returns true if all of the values in the left parameter array are in the right parameter array.

reference.Name: AND
reference.Description: Returns the logical and of 1 or more parameters

reference.Name: ANY
reference.Description: Returns true if any of the values in the left parameter array are in the right parameter array

reference.Name: BETWEEN
reference.Description: Returns a bool if the left parameter is greater that the first value of the right parameter array and less than the second value of the right parameter array

reference.Name: EQUALS
reference.Description: Returns true if the left integer is equal to the right

reference.Name: EXACTLY
reference.Description: Returns true if the left parameter array equals the right parameter array

reference.Name: GREATERTHAN
reference.Description: Returns true if the left integer is greater than the right

reference.Name: GREATERTHANOREQUAL
reference.Description: Returns true if the left integer is greater than or equal to the right

reference.Name: LESSTHAN
reference.Description: Returns true if the left integer is less than the right

reference.Name: LESSTHANOREQUAL
reference.Description: Returns true if the left integer is less than or equal the right

reference.Name: NONE
reference.Description: Returns true if none of the values in the left parameter array are in the right parameter array

reference.Name: NOT
reference.Description: Returns the logical not of the parameter

reference.Name: OR
reference.Description: Returns the logical or of 1 or more parameters

reference.Name: LIKE
reference.Description: Returns true if left string and right string are equal
